mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_punishment( punishmentName, punishmentDocNo,punishmentType, punishedPartyName,mainResponsibleName, mainIllegalFact, punishmentBasis,punishmentDecision,punisherName ,punishDate,status) VALUES ( #{bankPunishment.punishmentName},#{bankPunishment.punishmentDocNo},#{bankPunishment.punishmentType}, #{bankPunishment.punishedPartyName},#{bankPunishment.mainResponsibleName},#{bankPunishment.mainIllegalFact}, #{bankPunishment.punishmentBasis},#{bankPunishment.punishmentDecision},#{bankPunishment.punisherName}, #{bankPunishment.punishDate},#{bankPunishment.status})
mapper.update: update bank_punishment set punishmentName=#{bankPunishment.punishmentName}, punishmentDocNo=#{bankPunishment.punishmentDocNo}, punishmentType=#{bankPunishment.punishmentType}, punishedPartyName=#{bankPunishment.punishedPartyName}, mainResponsibleName=#{bankPunishment.mainResponsibleName}, mainIllegalFact=#{bankPunishment.mainIllegalFact}, punishmentBasis=#{bankPunishment.punishmentBasis}, punishmentDecision=#{bankPunishment.punishmentDecision}, punisherName=#{bankPunishment.punisherName}, punishDate=#{bankPunishment.punishDate}, status=#{bankPunishment.status} where id = #{bankPunishment.id}
mapper.select:
select * from bank_punishment
id=#{bankPunishment.id} and punishmentName=#{bankPunishment.punishmentName} and punishmentDocNo=#{bankPunishment.punishmentDocNo} and punishmentType=#{bankPunishment.punishmentType} and punishedPartyName=#{bankPunishment.punishedPartyName} and mainResponsibleName=#{bankPunishment.mainResponsibleName} and mainIllegalFact=#{bankPunishment.mainIllegalFact} and punishmentBasis=#{bankPunishment.punishmentBasis} and punishmentDecision=#{bankPunishment.punishmentDecision} and punisherName=#{bankPunishment.punisherName} and punishDate=#{bankPunishment.punishDate} and status=#{bankPunishment.status} and
